title: Digital Holography Market by Component, Application, Vertic
text:
NEW YORK , Oct.   Digital holography is a 3D technology which produces realistic 3D images of 2D objects with the help of CCD camera. Digital holography is gaining value owing to its growing applications in the medical and retail sectors. The major verticals of this technology such as medical, education, retail, and financial & banking have a large market size in terms of value. The demand for holographic display from automotive, commercial, consumer, and other sectors is driving the digital holography market. The digital holography market for the microscopy application is expected to grow at a CAGR of 51.8% between 2015 and 2020. The overall digital holography market is segmented on the basis of application into microscopy, holographic display, and holographic television & telepresence. Holographic microscopy is majorly used to display 3D images of living cells in real time in the medical sector. Holographic displays are used in the consumer and commercial sectors and are also expected to grow rapidly in the aerospace & defense and medical sectors. 
Geographically, North America is expected to grow at the highest CAGR of 39.8% in the digital holography market owing to the increasing demand for holographic display and telepresence in North America .
This report is based on an extensive research study of the digital holography market and aims to identify the entire market and all its subsegments through extensively detailed classifications. The demand for this technology is expected to rise, given the growing importance for digital holography among industry players across various verticals. 
A complete competitive landscape of the current market for digital holography is analyzed from the market share analysis and rankings of current key players and the other details of the key players are discussed in their company profiles. The competitive information provided in this report includes key developments, core strategies adopted by various players, acquisitions, new product developments, collaborations, and partnerships of key manufacturers along with their company profiles.
The report also discusses the future of the global market along with road-maps, upcoming technologies, markets, and applications with respect to the digital holography market. The key players in this industry include Eon Reality, Inc. (U.S.), Lyncee Tec SA ( Switzerland ), RealView Imaging Ltd. ( Israel ), Leia, Inc. (U.S.), Holoxica Ltd. (U.K.), Zebra Imaging Inc. (U.S.), Light Logics Holography and Optics Pvt Ltd. ( India ), Ovizio Imaging Systems NV/SA ( Belgium ), Geola Digital uab ( Lithuania ), and Jasper Display Corporation ( Taiwan ).
